name: Do you trust me? - Game By Mad Qadri
name_original: Do you trust me? - Game By Mad Qadri
description:
This is my game that I have uploaded for the Ryan Laley Game Jam! Hope you like it (even though it's trash)

P.S (VERY IMPORTANT): Use the F key on your keyboard (don't do this until level two if you want max dramaticness, pls), to turn on your flashlight once the bar has gone up.
